name: cameronsjo
description: Personal Claude Code plugins for release automation, Obsidian development, and more
author: cameronsjo

plugins.name: release-pipelines
plugins.description: Three-stage release pipeline (Beta → RC → Stable) for Node/TypeScript projects

plugins.name: obsidian-dev
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for Obsidian plugin development: scaffolding, TypeScript patterns, GitHub Actions, Release Please, BRAT integration

plugins.name: essentials

plugins.name: development
plugins.description: Development workflow tools - logging agents, project checks, linting, and context loading
